DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the effect of IgPro10 on the prevention of serious bacterial infections in patients with primary immunodeficiency. As secondary endpoints the rate of overall infections, the tolerability and safety of IgPro10 are studied. A part of the patients are participating in a pharmacokinetic substudy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Intravenous Immunoglobulin IgPro10 in Patients With Primary Immunodeficiencies (PID)
